definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Great progress has been made in iron nutrient molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 铁素营养分子生物学方面的研究有了很大进展。

sentences.english: Mirror-image DNA is one of the greatest discoveries in the history of molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 镜像DNA的存在是分子生物学史上一个重要发现。

sentences.english: The same is happening with the use of molecular biology techniques.
sentences.chinese: 同样这发生与分子生物学技术的应用上。

sentences.english: Advance in molecular biology of heterotrophic nitrifier is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 现就异养硝化微生物的分子生物学研究作一综述。

sentences.english: It mainly mediates cell apoptosis. Its function could be explained by its molecular characteristics to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 其分子生物学特征从一定程度上揭示了它的作用。

sentences.english: In recent years, the development of sports science has entered into the molecular biology area.
sentences.chinese: 近年来运动科学的发展已进入了分子生物学领域。

sentences.english: Crop improvement continues to benefit from advances in plant molecular biology and genomics.
sentences.chinese: 作物改良继续受益于先进的分子生物学和遗传学技术。

sentences.english: Human defensins have become a hot research topic in medical biology and molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 防御素已成为医学生物学和分子生物学研究的热点。

sentences.english: Department of Molecular Biology and Biochemistry of Hebei Medical University.
sentences.chinese: 河北医科大学生物化学与分子生物学教研室。

sentences.english: This course on Molecular Biology emphasizes the logic of experimental design and data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 本分子生物学课程着重于实验设计的逻辑与数据分析。

sentences.english: Look for a new molecular biology method to prevent PCO.
sentences.chinese: 探索防治PCO的分子生物学方法。

sentences.english: The central dogma of molecular biology deals with the detailed residue-by-residue transfer of sequential information.
sentences.chinese: 拉马克学说与分子生物学的中心法则是完全不一致的。

sentences.english: Objective To review the new techniques to study the pathology of temporal bones.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍用于颞骨病理学研究的分子生物学新技术。

sentences.english: Receptors and cell function regulation is a frontal sub-branch of cell biology and molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 受体和细胞功能调控是细胞和分子生物学的前沿分支。

sentences.english: Work on the molecular biology of bacillus thuringiensis is progressing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 苏云金芽孢杆菌的分子生物学研究进展迅速。

sentences.english: Recent progress in molecular biology. neuroimaging and the development of mouse models has e helped to elucidate the aetiology and clinical manifestations of NF1.
sentences.chinese: 分子生物学和影像学技术的进步以及大鼠模型的建立。
